attributes.action: stop trying to force carers to get a paid job and recognise the hard work we do do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the BBC website it says only those who have children under one or are severely disabled will be except from preparing for work. Carers already work and some of us have no time for courses etc to 'prepare for work' or to take a paid job. Some carers want to do a paid job but no carer should be forced into it by the benefits system. We already work hard and Mr Brown needs to recognise this.
